data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 710 believers in Al Marqab, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Marqab, Libya
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 710 believers in the state of Al Marqab to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Father, help your children in Al Marqab, Libya find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Al Marqab, Libya to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Arab, Libyan people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Arab, Libyan people.
Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Al Marqab, Libya into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Al Marqab.

data.section_summary:
the state of Al Marqab, Libya has a population of 448,300.

We estimate Al Marqab has 710 people who might know Jesus, 10,378 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 437,212 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 631 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Al Marqab, Libya know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.
